<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Energy Ward](/Feats.aspx?ID=6101) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 154 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Bloodrager](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=283) (Level 12)

**Frequency**
once per turn

**Requirements**
Your most recent action was to [cast](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734) a non-cantrip spell that dealt energy damage.

</column>

---

You convert energy from the last spell you cast into a protective ward. Until the start of your next turn, you gain resistance to one type of energy ([acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=524), [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555), [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604), [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=610), [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=697), [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509), or [void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510)) equal to 4 + the rank of the spell.
